debug.reload_shaders.unknown_error.built: Unknown error while loading built-in shaders
modmenu.summaryTranslation.shaderreload: Allows shader reloading, displaying errors in chat.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.shaderrel: Adds a debug feature to reload vanilla shaders with F3 + R, displays errors that occur while loading vanilla shaders, prevents resource packs from being disabled due to shader errors.
